org.apache.poi.hssf.record
Class FormulaRecord

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.poi.hssf.record.Record
      org.apache.poi.hssf.record.FormulaRecord
All Implemented Interfaces:
CellValueRecordInterface, java.lang.Comparable
public class FormulaRecord
extends Record
implements CellValueRecordInterface, java.lang.Comparable

Formula Record. REFERENCE: PG 317/444 Microsoft Excel 97 Developer's Kit (ISBN: 1-57231-498-2)

Version:
2.0-pre
Author:
Andrew C. Oliver (acoliver at apache dot org), Jason Height (jheight at chariot dot net dot au)

Constructor Detail

FormulaRecord

public FormulaRecord()
Creates new FormulaRecord

FormulaRecord

public FormulaRecord(short id,
                     short size,
                     byte[] data)
Constructs a Formula record and sets its fields appropriately.

Parameters:
id - id must be 0x06 (NOT 0x406 see MSKB #Q184647 for an "explanation of this bug in the documentation) or an exception will be throw upon validation
size - the size of the data area of the record
data - data of the record (should not contain sid/len)

FormulaRecord

public FormulaRecord(short id,
                     short size,
                     byte[] data,
                     int offset)
Constructs a Formula record and sets its fields appropriately.

Parameters:
id - id must be 0x06 (NOT 0x406 see MSKB #Q184647 for an "explanation of this bug in the documentation) or an exception will be throw upon validation
size - the size of the data area of the record
data - data of the record (should not contain sid/len)
offset - of the record's data

getParsedExpression

public java.util.List getParsedExpression()
get the stack as a list

Returns:
list of tokens (casts stack to a list and returns it!) this method can return null is we are unable to create Ptgs from existing excel file callers should check for null!
